snippet: Just three days before a strike deadline, the Canadian Auto Workers and the three Detroit automakers were far apart on major contract issues.
abstract: Talks between the Canadian Auto Workers union and Fiat’s Chrysler Group, General Motors and Ford Motor remain far apart on major contract issues just three days before a strike deadline.
lead_paragraph: Just three days before a strike deadline, the Canadian Auto Workers and the three Detroit automakers were far apart on major contract issues.

headline.main: Canada’s Autoworkers and Automakers Far Apart
headline.print_headline: Canada’s Autoworkers and Automakers Far Apart
